response.answer_text: As our world rapidly changes, technology consulting is becoming increasingly important to ensure the future growth of organisations globally. Technology consulting companies help their clients to transform the way they use technology and create better experiences for their customers. So, basically, they advise on how to improve your business processes, reduce costs, maximize use of tech opportunities, and more.  While new markets and competitors continue to emerge, technology companies face constantly face new challenges. When it comes to hiring a consulting organization, pay attention to their portfolio and experience in the field. One more important thing is that the IT consulting firm has the ability to listen, give an honest opinion about the issues and (what is more important) ability to provide solutions how to fix them according to your requirements. There are some of the decent and experienced consulting companies that could add value to your team: 1. PricewaterCoopers PwC is most well known for tax, audit, and advisory services, but has a significant presence in IT services and consulting. They combine business and industry insight with digital innovation to help companies accelerate the successful impact of digital. PwC helps companies address cyber security concerns with new technologies, enabling companies to keep their data and assets private. Additionally, PwC provides data and analytics consulting to help companies grow, operate effectively, and manage risk. 2. McKinsey & Company McKinsey & Company is a global management consulting firm. They proved to be the trusted advisor to the world's leading businesses, governments, and institutions across the private, public and social sectors. The company has deep functional and industry expertise and is passionate about taking on immense challenges that matter to their clients. 3. Jelvix Jelvix is a global technology consultancy assembling top-notch engineering teams for innovation-driven businesses worldwide. They serve as a technology partner leading digital transformation for best business outcomes. Having a wide range of expertise, they accelerate clients’ growth for different industries, including logistics and transportation, healthcare, financial services, retail, and more. Since 2011 they have been working as a software innovation partner to Fortune 500 companies, big enterprises and industry leaders: Auchan, Louis Vuitton, Uniqa, Canon, Samsung, Kia Motors, IKEA, Zeiss AG. Jelvix features a flexible and attentive team that adapts well to changing schedules and technological requirements. 4. Oliver Wyman Oliver Wyman is a leading global management consulting firm that combines deep industry knowledge with specialized expertise in strategy, operations, risk management, and organization transformation. Deep industry knowledge help them to bring their clients fresh perspectives and creative thinking to tough problems, helping to create significant, lasting change.The company has more than 60 offices in Europe, the Americas, and the Asia Pacific with 4,500 working employees in 27 countries. The company generated a revenue of US $1.9 billion in 2017. 5. Bain & Company Bain and Company is a top consulting firm specialized in the area of management consultancy. It was founded in the year 1973 and its headquarters are located in Boston, Massachusetts. The company showed rapid growth in the early '80s and was successful in generating a revenue of $3.7-$4.5 Billion in the year 2017. The company has its network spread in 59 locations worldwide with a force of 8,000 employees.
